      • write

        public int write(byte[] buf,
                 int pos,
                 int len)
        Write to the socket up to len bytes from the buffer buf starting at position pos.
        Parameters:
        buf - byte[] the buffer to write from
        pos - int starting position in buffer
        len - int number of bytes to write
        Returns:
        int on success, the number of bytes written, which may be smaller than len; on failure, -1

      • read

        public int read(byte[] buf,
                int pos,
                int len)
        Read from the socket up to len bytes into the buffer buf starting at position pos.
        Parameters:
        buf - byte[] the buffer
        pos - int starting position in buffer
        len - int number of bytes to read
        Returns:
        int on success, the number of bytes read, which may be smaller than len; on failure, -1
